column1: Organ Mapping Antibody Panel (OMAP) for Multiplexed Antibody-Based Imaging of Human Pancreas with CODEX

column2: Katja Steiger; Christopher Werlein; Andrea J. Radtke; Ellen M. Quardokus; Diane C. Saunders; Presha Rajbhandari

column22: Defines alpha cells in the Islet of Langerhans anatomical structure of the endocrine pancreas tissue, being the major counterpart to beta cells. This marker represents a core panel and prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.

Defines junctions that connect neighboring cells (adherens junctions). This marker cannot be used to describe a specific anatomical structure but represents a core panel and prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP for cell segmentation due to its presence in the plasma membrane.

Defines beta cells in the Islet of Langerhans anatomical structure of the endocrine pancreas tissue, being the major counterpart to alpha cells. This marker represents a core panel and prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.
Defines ductal epithelial cells in the ductal tree (large ducts) anatomical structure of the pancreas tissue. This marker represents a core panel and prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.
Defines the vasculature of the pancreas being a marker for blood endothelial cells. This marker represents a prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.

Defines delta cells in the Islet of Langerhans anatomical structure of the endocrine pancreas tissue, acting as a paracrine inhibitor of insulin and glucagon secretion. This marker represents a core panel and prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP

This marker does not define a specific anatomical structure but can be used for cell segmentation. This marker is found within the membrane that surrounds epithelial cells, regulating cell-cell adhesions.

Defines pancreatic polypeptide cells in the Islet of Langerhans (head of pancreas) anatomical structure of the endocrine pancreas tissue, regulating  pancreatic secretion activities by both endocrine and exocrine tissues. This marker represents a prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.

Defines neural cells and neuroendocrine cells in the Islet of Langerhans anatomical structure of the endocrine pancreas tissue, exerting a regulatory function on the secretion of different hormones. This marker represents a prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.
Defines smooth muscle cells in vascular walls and, when combined with vimentin, can be used to describe pancreatic stellate cells. This marker represents a prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.

Defines beta cells in the Islet of Langerhans anatomical structure of the endocrine pancreas tissue, contributing to the maintenance of glucose physiological levels specifically by inhibiting insulin and glucagon secretion. This marker represents a prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.
Defines the stroma of the pancreas as an anatomical structure by labeling mesenchymal cells. This marker represents a core panel and prioritized target in the pancreas OMAP.
